main event: An irregular shaped object, approximately 35 feet across, with trails of light, was observed moving slowly across the sky in Wilmington, North Carolina on 5 Aug 1960.
interesting points: The UFO was observed for about 10 minutes with no sound detected., The sighting occurred from a pine-covered area which later became obscured by heavy brush and swampy ground., Witness received notification from a power company lineman about the object falling., The object tumbled to the ground and disappeared from view after about 12 minutes., There was no physical evidence found, but a caution was issued for air traffic due to its proximity to a power line.
sighted object: an irregular shaped object 35 ft across
witness description: civilian observer, not affiliated with military
